Saba Software, Inc. | Company Profile, Marketing Contacts, Media Spend, Brands

Saba Software, headquartered in Redwood Shores, CA, offers people management solutions that are used by more than 1,300 organizations and over 17 million end users worldwide. Saba’s solutions increase organizational performance by aligning workforce goals with organizational strategy; developing, managing and rewarding their people; and improving collaboration. Saba product offerings address all aspects of strategic people management and are available both on-premise and OnDemand.
